title: Nijiiro Hotaru: Eien no Natsuyasumi
synopsis: Yuuta was 12-year-old boy, who had lost his father in the traffic accident one year ago. In the summer vacation, he visited a deserted dam deep in the mountains, where he had a good time with his father before.
staff: [['Uda, Kounosuke', ['Director']], ['Matsutoya, Yumi', ['Theme Song Performance', ' Theme Song Composition']], ['Ohira, Shinya', ['Key Animation']], ['Hashimoto, Shinji', ['Key Animation']]]
